comments.comment: Exactly, I met a Samurdi Niyamaka in December and I asked under what basis free money is given monthly. The answer was so wired and no performance check is done. They just keep giving money and families once or twice a year claim money to buy foods.  Most of the Siri Lankan are like that. They are the best free loaders. The country has come to such a pathetic state because of this poor mentality.  Italian authorities should take stern actions against those and deport as soon as possible. Italian tax payers do not pay their hard earned money as taxes for these sort of useless souls.

Yes, like Siri Lanka

My friend, don't think all expats living in foreign countries are living the same life as these fellows. I came to this country 10 years ago with a small salary and worked hard towards goals and today I earn something in a global firm for month where a commoner in Sri lanka earns for a year. There were days I didn't have a proper meal. Lived with 10 Sri Lankan friends in the same apartment. Now I live here with my family and we are happy bout it. Bottom line here is, if you have a strong will and dedication, you can reach your goals in due time. There are no easy ways to succes. I didn't wish to boast about me but just gave my two cents as an example.  Whoever wish to go to another country looking for a better life, always should keep in mind the perpose you came and to work towards that goal. If you can do that, tomorrow will be beautiful for you and your loved ones.

Sri Lanka is still a developing country, because most of the Sri Lankan people are lazy. Most of the government servants don't do their duty. Most of the government servants are corrupted. Any government can't develop a country with these type of lazy people.

Oya inne lankawe iddith somma kudu tikai ganja tikai indala hitala adiyak daala ohe indala ammala thaththala idam gewal ugas thiyala lankawe thiyaganna beri kamatai Wena lankawe karanna deyak nethi kamatai ithali giya un kiyana surangana katha passe gihilla gewal wala minissunge olu winasa karapu un thamai ohe awilla ohoma pajathi wenne. Oya wage un pita kotuwe dusim ganan hoyaganna puluwan. Ath un oyita wediya grade eke innawa mokada un lankawe nisa. Oya inna un alien la nisa padekata kauruth ganan ganne nehe.
